item.title: Begin WY-387 North at I-25
item.description: Begin WY-387 north at I-25/US-87. Use I-25 South/US-87 South for Casper. I-25 North/US-87 North is signed for Midwest, where actually WY-387 north heads towards Midwest. The actual destination for I-25/US-87 North would be for Kaycee or Buffalo.

item.title: I-25 South at WY-387
item.description: I-25 south at WY-387. Use WY-387 North for Midwest and Edgerton. Continue ahead to return to I-25 south. Notice the closed highway gate for severe weather.

item.title: End WY-387 West at I-25/US-87
item.description: End WY-387 west at I-25/US-87 (Exit 227) near Midwest.

item.title: WY-387 South Approaching WY-259
item.description: WY-387 south approaching WY-259. Continue ahead (via county road) for Midwest. Turn right to continue on WY-387 south for Kaycee and Casper. Destinations via WY-259 (left turn) are not signed.

item.title: WY-387 West at WY-258
item.description: WY-387 south at WY-258 in Midwest. Turn right to continue west on WY-387, and for I-25 traffic. It is probably shorter for I-25 south traffic to use WY-259 south, even though it is signed otherwise.

item.title: WY-387 South at WY-192
item.description: WY-387 South at WY-192. Use WY-192 north for Linch.

item.title: WY-387 South Approaching WY-192
item.description: WY-387 South approaching WY-192 North in rural Johnson County.

item.title: WY-59 North At WY-387 South
item.description: WY-59 North at WY-387 South. Use WY-387 south for Midwest and Wright.
